title: Ep 121 - The Voice Of Culpable
description:
In today’s episode, Todd takes a deep dive into Season 1 of the hit, true-crime podcast Culpable with the host of Culpable, Dennis Cooper. Season 1 tells the story of the suspicious death of Christian Andreacchio of Meridian, MS, the controversial death investigation that was ruled a suicide and Christian’s mother’s uphill battle to get the case re-opened and investigated as a homicide.

As you’ll learn in this episode, Dennis, who is also the founder of Black Mountain Media, and his team not only do a brilliant job of telling this compelling story but they also, with the help of a team of private investigators, cast even more doubt on the integrity of the police investigation and the coroner’s ruling. It’s a story we felt compelled to share and we’re grateful to Dennis for coming on the show to do so.

You can listen to Culpable anywhere you listen to podcasts. You can follow them at @culpablepodcast on Twitter and Instagram and you can visit their website at culpablepodcast.com.

Black Mountain Media is offering a $100,000 reward to anyone who provides information that helps solve this case. You can submit a tip by emailing them at tips@blackmountainmedia.net or leave a message at (470) 300-4915.

We take care of each other. It’s what we do.
